column1: The plaintiff's case was that she married the Defendant on 12.09.1972  and there were
three children born out of this marriage. She alleged in her plaint that;

column2: the Defendant neglected her and the matrimonial home;
the Defendant was callous of the plaintiff's feelings;
the Defendant constantly quarreled  and abused her in the presence of outsiders
the  Defendant  did  not  heed  any  reasonable  request  of  the  Plaintiff  and  his
conduct brought an end to the marriage.
